mapper.sql: id AS "id" , order_id AS "orderId" , charge_mobile_number AS "chargeMobileNumber" , charge_data_size AS "chargeDataSize" , charge_status AS "chargeStatus" , charge_task_id AS "chargeTaskId" , charge_times AS "chargeTimes" , charge_rtn_code AS "chargeRtnCode" , charge_rtn_msg AS "chargeRtnMsg" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_svp_mobile_data_order_detail ( id, order_id, charge_mobile_number, charge_data_size, charge_status, charge_task_id, charge_times, charge_rtn_code, charge_rtn_msg, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{chargeMobileNumber}, #{chargeDataSize}, #{chargeStatus}, #{chargeTaskId}, #{chargeTimes}, #{chargeRtnCode}, #{chargeRtnMsg}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
